name: BugsnagAutoVersion
description: An Azure DevOps build task for updating your current Bugsnag AppVersion and notifying bugsnag of your release.
author: ThatBlokeCalledJay

inputs.name: JsonFile
inputs.label: Json file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your json file which holds the Bugsnag AppVersion value. This would typically be your appsettings.json file.

inputs.name: PropertyPath
inputs.label: Json property path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The json path to your Bugsnag AppVersion property. [More Help](https://github.com/ThatBlokeCalledJay/bugsnag-auto-version/wiki/Getting-Started)

inputs.name: VersionMask
inputs.label: Version mask
inputs.helpMarkDown: A mask to indicate which version values are to be automatically incremented. [More Help](https://github.com/ThatBlokeCalledJay/bugsnag-auto-version/wiki/Getting-Started)

inputs.name: VersionVariable
inputs.label: Version variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of your DevOps variable which will hold current version.

inputs.name: DevOpsPAT
inputs.label: Azure DevOps PAT
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your Personal Access Token for Azure DevOps.

inputs.name: NotifyBugsnag
inputs.label: Notify Bugsnag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Notify Bugsnag about your latest build. [Go to the Bugsnag Docs](https://bugsnagbuildapi.docs.apiary.io/)

inputs.name: BugsnagUrl
inputs.label: Bugsnag notify URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Bugsnag notify URL. [Go to the Bugsnag Docs](https://bugsnagbuildapi.docs.apiary.io/)

inputs.name: BugsnagAutoAssignRelease
inputs.label: Auto assign release
inputs.helpMarkDown: Auto assign release. [Go to the Bugsnag Docs](https://bugsnagbuildapi.docs.apiary.io/)

inputs.name: BugsnagSourceControl
inputs.label: Include source control information
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include source control information when notifying Bugsnag of a build. [Go to the Bugsnag Docs](https://bugsnagbuildapi.docs.apiary.io/)

inputs.name: BugsnagSCProvider
inputs.label: Source control provider
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose your repository provider. For help with 'Azure DevOps Git (unofficial)' [Go to the Getting Started Docs](https://github.com/ThatBlokeCalledJay/bugsnag-auto-version/wiki/Getting-Started). For the other options [Go to the Bugsnag Docs](https://bugsnagbuildapi.docs.apiary.io/)

inputs.name: BugsnagSCRepo
inputs.label: Repository URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the repository containing the source code being deployed. [Go to the Bugsnag Docs](https://bugsnagbuildapi.docs.apiary.io/)

inputs.name: BugsnagSCRevision
inputs.label: Revision
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source control SHA-1 hash for the code that has been built (short or long hash). [Go to the Bugsnag Docs](https://bugsnagbuildapi.docs.apiary.io/)

OutputVariables.name: BUGSNAG_AUTO_VERSION
OutputVariables.description: This variable holds the latest bugsnag version generated during this task's execution.
